label: 5071xx
info_overview: Single-surface push-button: Top button: Association Group = 1 Parameter no. = 0 Bottom button: Association Group = 2 Parameter no. = 1
info_inclusion: Triple click on operating surface LED flashes approx. 6 seconds. Used for include/exclude the device by the primary
info_exclusion: Triple click on operating surface LED flashes approx. 6 seconds. Used for include/exclude the device by the primary
info_wakeup: Triple click on operating surface LED flashes approx. 6 seconds.
